mixed_methods_research.name: Mixed Methods Research (General)
mixed_methods_research.purpose: Integrating quantitative and qualitative data to provide a more complete understanding of a research problem.
strengths_for_protocol_research: May provide richer insights than a single method alone
limitations_considerations: Requires expertise in both quantitative and qualitative methods
Can be time-consuming and complex to integrate findings meaningfully

timeline_breakdown.total_duration: Varies greatly depending on specific design
